leave a long tail for sewing single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and next 29 chains chain 1 turn 30 2 single_crochet in same stitch as ch1 single_crochet x 4 increase single_crochet x 5 increase x 3 single_crochet x 6 chain 1 turn 34 3 single_crochet x 3 increase x 8 single_crochet x 2 42 finish off and leave tail for weaving change to cream starting from the other end of the collar at row 1 single_crochet 3 along the side then work your first single_crochet for row 4 into the last stitch just worked you will have 2 single_crochet in the corner 4 single_crochet half_double_crochet
